ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is for Opportunities that are placed in Return Cancelled Stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Return Cancelled"), ISCHANGED(StageName) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Administrators can modify opportunities in Return Cancelled stage.
